is a type of non-numeric diagram that consists of concentric circles representing categories. Each outer ring represents a category that includes all of its inner circles.  Onion diagrams are used to describe the relationship of several categories…

functionsYaml.name: concept visualization
functionsYaml.description: Connections between concepts that are not quantified.
